00017 // definition of IndivSpikeOutputter class
00018 // outputs the spikes individually to a file
00020 
00021 class IndivSpikeOutputter
00022         : public Outputter
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     IndivSpikeOutputter() {}
00026 protected:
00027     void do_operation(const Time & , const Time &) {
00028         // one file per group
00029         pmat_ = matOpen(file_name().c_str(), "w");
00030         matClose(pmat_);
00031 
00032         DataRecordNeuronVisitor vis;
00033         for (std::list<Group * const>::const_iterator i = group_list().begin();
00034                 i != group_list().end();
00035                 ++i) {
00036             std::string varname;
00037             char tmp[3];
00038             _itoa_s((*i)->id(), tmp, 3, 10);
00039             varname = std::string("Group") + tmp;
00040             std::cout << "writing spikes for " << varname << std::endl;
00041 
00042             Size numSpikeVecs = (Size)(*i)->size();
00043 
00044             mxArray * mxArr = 0
00045                               , * mxCell = mxCreateCellMatrix((mwSize)numSpikeVecs, 1);
00046             double * data = 0;
00047             //-------
00048             mwIndex jstruct = 0;
00049             Size count = 1;
00050 
00051             for (std::list<NeuronInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator j = get_neuron_list(*i).begin();
00052                     j != get_neuron_list(*i).end();
00053                     ++j) {
00054                 (*j)->apply_visitor(vis);
00055 
00056                 if (vis.spike_time_list_pointer() != 0) {
00057                     // init the array where to put the spike times
00058                     if (mxArr) mxDestroyArray(mxArr);
00059                     mxArr = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, (Size) vis.spike_time_list_pointer()->size(), mxREAL);
00060                     data = mxGetPr(mxArr);
00061                     // test if initialisation went well
00062                     if (!data) {
00063                         // not enough memory suppposedly
00064                         mxDestroyArray(mxCell);
00065                         mxDestroyArray(mxArr);
00066                         return;
00067                         std::cout << "prob when writing spike times for " << varname << std::endl;
00068                     }
00069 
00070                     // write the spike times in the array of doubles
00071                     Size pos = 0;
00072                     for (std::deque<Time>::const_iterator k = vis.spike_time_list_pointer()->begin();
00073                             k != vis.spike_time_list_pointer()->end();
00074                             ++k, ++pos) {
00075 //                  file_ << (*k) << "\t";
00076                         data[pos] = (*k);
00077                     }
00078 
00079                     // append the array in the cell structure
00080                     mxSetCell(mxCell, jstruct++, mxDuplicateArray(mxArr));
00081 
00082                 } else std::cout << "prob: empty spikelist";
00083                 vis.reset();
00084             }
00085 
00086             // write the cell structure in the file
00087             pmat_ = matOpen(file_name().c_str(), "u");
00088             if (pmat_) {
00089                 //Write the Cell Array to the MATfile
00090 
00091                 int retFlag = matPutVariable(pmat_, varname.c_str(), mxCell);
00092                 matClose(pmat_);
00093                 //Free memory
00094                 mxDestroyArray(mxCell);
00095 
00096                 if (retFlag != 0) {
00097                     std::cout << "error writing spike trains in matlab file: " + retFlag;
00098                 }
00099             }
00100 
00101         }
00102     }
00103 private:
00104     MATFile * pmat_;
00105 };

00110 // definition of SingleSpikeListOutputter class
00111 // computes the operation on each spike list
00112 // Operation is a functor (const std::deque<Time> &, const Time &, const Time &)
00114 
00115 template <class Operation>
00116 class SingleSpikeListOperationOutputter
00117         : public Outputter
00118 {
00119 protected:
00120     void do_operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop) {
00121         DataRecordNeuronVisitor vis;
00122         for (std::list<Group * const>::const_iterator i = group_list().begin();
00123                 i != group_list().end();
00124                 ++i)
00125             for (std::list<NeuronInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator j = get_neuron_list(*i).begin();
00126                     j != get_neuron_list(*i).end();
00127                     ++j) {
00128                 (*j)->apply_visitor(vis);
00129                 file_ << op(vis.spike_time_list(), t_start, t_stop) << "\t";
00130                 vis.reset();
00131             }
00132         file_ << std::endl;
00133     }
00134 private:
00135     Operation op;
00136 };

00141 // definition of CrossSpikeListOperationOutputter class
00142 // computes the operation on each spike list
00143 // Operation is a functor (const std::deque<Time> &, const std::deque<Time> &, const Time &, const Time &)
00145 
00146 template <class Operation>
00147 class CrossSpikeListOperationOutputter
00148         : public Outputter
00149 {
00150 protected:
00151     void do_operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop) {
00152         DataRecordNeuronVisitor vis1, vis2;
00153         for (std::list<Group * const>::const_iterator i1 = group_list().begin();
00154                 i1 != group_list().end();
00155                 ++i1)
00156             for (std::list<NeuronInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator j1 = get_neuron_list(*i1).begin();
00157                     j1 != get_neuron_list(*i1).end();
00158                     ++j1) {
00159                 (*j1)->apply_visitor(vis1);
00160                 for (std::list<Group * const>::const_iterator i2 = group_list().begin();
00161                         i2 != group_list().end();
00162                         ++i2)
00163                     for (std::list<NeuronInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator j2 = get_neuron_list(*i2).begin();
00164                             j2 != get_neuron_list(*i2).end();
00165                             ++j2) {
00166                         (*j2)->apply_visitor(vis2);
00167                         file_ << op_(vis1.spike_time_list(), vis2.spike_time_list(), t_start, t_stop) << "\t";
00168                         vis2.reset();
00169                     }
00170                 vis1.reset();
00171                 file_ << std::endl;
00172             }
00173         file_ << std::endl;
00174     }
00175 private:
00176     Operation op_;
00177 };
